  • Method Details

    • onSaveButtonClick

      public void onSaveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Saves product. When save button is clicked, validates input is correct and creates a new product for Inventory. Returns to main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - click save button

    • onCancelButtonClick

      public void onCancelButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads main form. When cancel button clicked, returns to main form view.
      Parameters:
      event - cancel button click
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onRemoveAssociatedPartClick

      public void onRemoveAssociatedPartClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes associated part from list. When remove associated part button is clicked, confirms and removes selected associated part from associated part table view.
      Parameters:
      event - remove associated parts button click

    • onSearchEnter

      public void onSearchEnter(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Search for parts. When the search bar is active and enter is pressed, compares inputted string to those from Inventory to show matched results on product data table view.
      Parameters:
      event - enter button

    • onAddProductClick

      public void onAddProductClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds part to associated parts list. When add button for product is clicked, adds selected associated parts to a list and adds that list to associated parts view table.
      Parameters:
      event - add part button clicked

    • sendProduct

      public void sendProduct(int idx, Product product)
      Sends information between controllers. Sets values in the modify product form based on the selected product from main form controller.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of product
      product - product

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize method sets data. Populates parts table as well as associated parts table.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
